name: Enterprise Corp
overview: ENTERPRISECORP is the enterprise development arm of Greater Louisville Inc. Our mission is to dramatically increase the number and quality of fast-growth companies headquartered in our region â€“ companies that create the vast majority of new wealth, new revenue and new jobs. Our client portfolio ranges from technology start-ups to mature businesses in traditional industries. Our goal: to help entrepreneurs with potential for fast-growth fund and run their companies. To achieve that goal, we offer a dedicated team of professionals and a proven set of Client Solutions: Technology Commercialization ,Growth Capital and Business Advising.
